name: The Palms Eagles Alliance Hotel
description: Features a pool, positive customer reviews for its food and service, and offers reasonable pricing.

name: Stanbic Bank
description: Provides good banking services and customer service.

name: Ecobank
address: Plot No. 34, Axim Road, Harbour Commercial Area, PMB
description: Ecobank offers a full range of personal and business banking services, including current and savings accounts, loans, investments, mobile and internet banking, and mobile money.

name: Atlantic Hotel
description: The Atlantic Hotel in Takoradi is now the Best Western Plus Serene Atlantic Hotel. It's a well-known, historic four-star hotel that re-opened in 2013 after extensive renovations and offers amenities like pools, a golf course, and ocean views. The hotel is a popular choice for both business and leisure travelers in Ghana's Western Region.

name: Takoradi Golf Course
description: It has been noted for having a big space for outdoor programs and good customer service.

name: Country Club
description: The Country Club is a culinary haven located in the heart of Takoradi, Ghana. This restaurant invites tourists to indulge in an array of delectable dishes.

name: Snap Finger Restaurant
description: Snap Finger Restaurant in Takoradi is a fast-food eatery known for serving a variety of local and continental dishes, including Chinese and African cuisine. Located on Chief Ainoo Avenue, it offers options for dine-in, takeout, and delivery.

name: Takoradi Mall
description: Takoradi Mall is a modern shopping center in Takoradi, Ghana, that first opened in 2018. As the only mall of its kind in Ghana's Western and Central regions, it offers a variety of local and international shops and services.
